squidpony.squidgrid.gui.swing.animation

Class BumpAnimation

  • java.lang.Object
    • squidpony.squidgrid.gui.swing.animation.AbstractAnimation
      • squidpony.squidgrid.gui.swing.animation.BumpAnimation
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.util.EventListener, Animation

    public class BumpAnimation
extends AbstractAnimation
    Animates an object moving smoothly in a direction and then bouncing back.
    Author:
    Eben Howard - http://squidpony.com - howard@squidpony.com
